logger.doc:name: Start Logger
logger.message: correlationId:#[vars.correlationId], transactionId:#[vars.transactionId], the flow to update the covid cases has started: #[vars.inputPayload]

ee:variables.ee:set-variable: %dw 2.0 output application/json --- { caseId: vars.inputPayload.covidCase.caseID, source: vars.inputPayload.covidCase.source, case_type: vars.inputPayload.covidCase.caseType, first_name: vars.inputPayload.covidCase.firstName, last_name: vars.inputPayload.covidCase.lastName, phone: vars.inputPayload.covidCase.phone, email: vars.inputPayload.covidCase.email, date_of_birth: vars.inputPayload.covidCase.dateOfBirth, national_id: vars.inputPayload.covidCase.nationalID, national_id_type: vars.inputPayload.covidCase.nationalIDType, street_address: vars.inputPayload.covidCase.address.streetAddress, city: vars.inputPayload.covidCase.address.city, state: vars.inputPayload.covidCase.address.state, postal: vars.inputPayload.covidCase.address.postal, country: vars.inputPayload.covidCase.address.country }

db:update.doc:name: Update covid case
db:update.db:sql: update data set source=:source, case_type=:case_type, first_name=:first_name, last_name=:last_name, phone=:phone, email=:email, date_of_birth=:date_of_birth, national_id=:national_id, national_id_type=:national_id_type, street_address=:street_address, city=:city, state=:state, postal=:postal, country=:country where caseId=:caseId

logger.doc:name: End Logger
logger.message: the flow to update covid case completed
